definition[0]: a piece of equipment in a house, for example a cooker or a fridge, that can be moved or taken with you when you sell the house
definition[1]: an outside part of a piece of equipment that makes it possible to use or handle it
example[0]: a sink with chrome fittings  (=handle and taps)
definition[2]: an occasion when you put on a piece of clothing that is being made for you, to see if it fits properly
definition[3]: right for a particular situation or occasion
example[2]: I thought the memorial was a fitting tribute to the president.
example[3]: a fitting end to what was a memorable trip
example[4]: It is only fitting that Simon should propose the first toast tonight.
